author: Fluffy-Discussion326
body: NTA  However the best thing to do is smile and say "I'll keep it in mind", then file that thing away likely never to view again.  Then do what you think is best.  It's not worth your breath arguing with something or someone unreasonable.  You'll get no where.  So it is best to just smile, say thanks, I'll keep it in mind and then do what is best for you.
